// Pivot 0, 0
int L_Flipper[16] = {
	8, 15,
	49, 13,
	52, 12,
	52, 9,
	49, 7,
	8, 4,
	4, 6,
	4, 13
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float L_Flipper[16] = {
	0.140351f, 0.750000f,
	0.859649f, 0.650000f,
	0.912281f, 0.600000f,
	0.912281f, 0.450000f,
	0.859649f, 0.350000f,
	0.140351f, 0.200000f,
	0.070175f, 0.300000f,
	0.070175f, 0.650000f
};
